heading.label: Portfolio
heading.title: Selected Productions
heading.subtitle: Projects executed across amphitheaters, festivals, and high-stakes corporate environments.

projects.title: Red Rocks Amphitheatre
projects.description: Laser and effects package for a sold-out headline set, integrated with a touring lighting system across a 9,500-capacity venue.
projects.longDescription: Red Rocks requires clean execution with limited margin for rework. We advanced rigging and cue architecture with the touring team ten days out, deployed a 22-fixture MAC Ultra system, synchronized a Kvant array to timecode, and integrated CO2 hits into the music stack. The show ran without technical holds and delivered full cue fidelity from first song through encore.

projects.title: Denver Tech Summit
projects.description: General session production for 1,200 attendees with LED keynote canvas, distributed PA, and confidence system routing.
projects.longDescription: The venue had no turnkey infrastructure for a broadcast-grade keynote. We built the room from zero with a flown line-array solution, a 384-tile LED wall, and redundant signal paths for media and confidence feeds. The production supported executive presentations, panel transitions, and live content roll-ins with zero switch failures.

projects.title: Mountain Music Festival
projects.description: Three-day festival production at altitude with two stages, synchronized sunset show moments, and weather-adaptive operations.
projects.longDescription: At 8,400 feet, system behavior and logistics change fast. We pre-advanced power and weather contingencies, deployed dedicated systems per stage, and coordinated a timed laser and fireworks sequence at dusk. Across three days and multiple artist turnovers, the site remained on schedule and within spec.

projects.title: Annual Corporate Gala
projects.description: Architectural lighting and show control for a high-profile executive gala inside a non-standard rigging environment.
projects.longDescription: The museum venue imposed strict rigging and preservation constraints. We engineered a custom ground-support system, designed camera-safe lighting scenes around permanent installations, and delivered a balanced mix for speeches, dinner programming, and awards. The client received a cinematic room with full compliance to venue policy.

projects.title: Neon Nights Festival
projects.description: Headline EDM stage with 40kW laser deployment and synchronized effects choreography across an 80-foot stage line.
projects.longDescription: For the closing set, the artist direction demanded high-density beams with exact cue precision. We programmed an eight-position laser topology, integrated cryo timing into playback automation, and ran pre-show safety verification with site operations. The final sequence hit every programmed transition and became the campaign hero content.

projects.title: EcoTech Product Launch
projects.description: Media launch with projection-mapped reveal architecture and timed scenic movement for the hero announcement.
projects.longDescription: The reveal concept required physical concealment, projection precision, and single-pass execution. We designed a custom scenic structure, mapped content to curved geometry, and rehearsed full sequence timing over two technical days. The product unveil executed in one live pass for press and investor coverage.
